publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7783 Cathy Peattie: Central FM—That the Parliament congratulates Central FM on beingchosen as the top small Scottish radio station in theprestigious Sony Radio Awards; considers that the station provides excellent news coverage and a high standard of entertainment andshows a commitment tolocal communities, and wishes the station success in the UK finals of this category, which isfor stations with an adult listenership of under 300,000. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-7783 Central FM (lodged on 25 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Jack McConnell*, Bill Kidd*, Mr Frank McAveety*, John Park*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Marlyn Glen*, Robin Harper*, Mary Mulligan*, Hugh Henry*, Murdo Fraser*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-7783 Central FM (lodged on 25 January 2011) Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Mitchell*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Sandra White*
